main.info6: I always try to learn new techs and share my knowledge with others. to achieve this, I challenge myself in various projects. I would be happy if I could help you with your projects

work.description: Extensive hands-on experience migrating and breaking down legacy monolith applications into microservices making the best use of cloud environments ,Day to day activities included development ,assessing and estimating feature requests and issues as well  as doing code reviews for my team mates on regular basis , Day to day activities included development and team management tasks .

work.title: Full stack application developer

testimonials.text: Mahmoud is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us...
Mahmoud has always been an example to follow. I always look at him with a view of appreciation and respect. He is amazing in speed of learning and intelligence.
